text: أَفَلَمۡ يَدَّبَّرُواْ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ أَمۡ جَآءَهُم مَّا لَمۡ يَأۡتِ ءَابَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

translation.en: Then have they not reflected over the Qur'an, or has there come to them that which had not come to their forefathers
translation.id: Maka tidaklah mereka menghayati firman (Allah), atau adakah telah datang kepada mereka apa yang tidak pernah datang kepada nenek moyang mereka dahulu
